name: Hedge Maze '96
description:
Hedge Maze '96 is a look into what a first person 3D maze game could look/feel like on an original gameboy (if the hardware could handle it).

Sticks to the stylistic gameboy restraints however:  controls, colours, etc

This game is my first step into making 3D games and most likely has a ton of errors. I threw this together in a few days over a busy weekend. Although it might not look like much, I'm pretty happy overall with the progress I've made considering.

Controls

ActionKeyboardGameboy/ControllerMoveWASDD-Pad/Left-Stick
Look
K - left, L -right
A - left, B - rightPauseBStart
